description: A classic light recipe for Savoiardi that are great for dunking.
name: Savoiardi Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3 tbs castor sugar (for sprinkling on top)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Line 2 baking trays with baking paper. Transfer the mixture into a piping bag and pipe out onto the baking tray, sprinkle castor sugar on top and bake for 10 mins or until golden brown.
Place egg whites in mixing bowl and beat on high speed until soft peaks form. Then add 2 tablespoons of sugar and continue to beat until you get a smooth and glossy consistency.
Place egg whites in a bowl and set aside. In a mixing bowl place egg yolks, adding remaining sugar and vanilla essence. Beat until thick and pale in colour. Set aside.
In a bowl sift plain flour and baking powder and set aside.
Fold half of the egg whites with the egg yolk mixture. Then fold in flour and then the remaining egg whites. Allow to completely cool on wire rack and enjoy.
